items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer â€” A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A lightweight React SDK for integrating Tapd's in-venue engagement features. Easily prompt users to join rewards, track visits, and trigger upsell actions using prebuilt, customizable components. Designed for seamless integration with any React-based frontend.
